fuse_log.c

10
11#include "fuse_log.h"
12
13#include <stdarg.h>
14#include <stdio.h>
15
16static void default_log_func(
17 __attribute__(( unused )) enum fuse_log_level level,
18 const char *fmt, va_list ap)
19{
20 vfprintf(stderr, fmt, ap);
21}
22
23static fuse_log_func_t log_func = default_log_func;
24
25void fuse_set_log_func(fuse_log_func_t func)
26{
27 if (!func)
28 func = default_log_func;
29
30 log_func = func;
31}
32
33void fuse_log(enum fuse_log_level level, const char *fmt, ...)
34{
35 va_list ap;
36
37 va_start(ap, fmt);
38 log_func(level, fmt, ap);
39 va_end(ap);
40}
